name: Card Cannons
description:
A Head-to-Head Sea Battle Web Game with a twist: your cannons are your cards.

Instead of shooting directly, you and your opponent play cards to gather dubloons and operate your guns. Need more firepower? You can spend your dubloons on it in the Trade Row, but be careful: you share the Trade Row with your opponent, and they can buy the cards you’ve got your eyes own.

Last Captain Standing wins!

P1 Controls: Move: WASD Navigate Cards: C and B Play Card: F Switch Rows: V

P2 Controls: Move: Arrows Navigate Cards: J and L Play Card: I Switch Rows: K

As per Ludum Dare Tradition (law?), the source code is available on my Github under GPL-3.0: 
https://github.com/ThomasApplewhite/MichiganShips
